Class.ClassComment: AutoInstantiableFactory /** * Component factories that implement this interface can be instantiated automatically by component registries when looking up components. Typically, most component factories will implement this. One known exception is the {@link org.infinispan.factories.BootstrapFactory}. <p/> Anything implementing this interface should expose a public, no-arg constructor. <p/> * @author Manik Surtani * @since 4.0 */
